articles.author: Reghu Balakrishnan
articles.title: Temasek set for controlling stake in Manipal Hospitals - The Economic Times
articles.description: Manipal Health has been expanding its footprint across the country through multiple buyouts. In 2020, it acquired the Indian assets of Columbia Asia Hospitals for ₹2,100 crore and, in June 2021, it bought out Bengaluru-based Vikram Hospitals from Multiples Pr…
articles.content: Singapore government-owned fund Temasek Holdings is acquiring an additional 41% stake in Manipal Health Enterprises from existing investors and the promoter family for 16,500 crore, in what will be t… [+3290 chars]
